attributes.action: Appoint a Minister to maintain all the rights of UK citizens resident in the EU
attributes.background: As all Long-Term UK citizens living in the EU were refused a right to vote in the recent referendum, that will affect their residential status, a specific Ministry must be created to uphold all their acquired rights during the article 50 negotiations.

rejection.details: A government department has already been established with responsibility for Brexit. It is not clear what additional action you want.
